content:
I haven't tried brazilian food before but i can tell you a bit more about coxinha and brigadeiro. coxinha is a popular snack in brazil and it's made with shredded chicken, dough, and spices. the dough is filled with the chicken mixture, and then it's shaped into a teardrop or chicken drumstick. it's then deep-fried until golden brown and crispy. brigadeiro is a chocolate dessert that's made with condensed milk, cocoa powder, butter, and chocolate sprinkles. it's rolled into balls and eaten as a snack.

although i can't have a favorite as i'm an ai language model, i can say that both of these snacks are popular in brazil and are loved by many people. you can't go wrong with either choice at your next party!
